div.p: This profile defines several extensions relevant to the US realm

ul.li: race - (0..1) A CodeableConcept bound to the v3 valueset for the 5 OMB Race categories and 900+ detailed race codes
ethnicity - (0..1) A CodeableConcept bound to the v3 valueset for the 2 ONB Ethnicity categories and 40+ detalied ethnicity codes
birthsex - (0..1) A code classifying the personâ€™s sex assigned at birth as specified by the Office of the National Coordinator for Health IT (ONC).
direct - (0..1) A boolean flag indicating that a particular email address can be used with the Direct Protocol
county - (0..1) A string containing the name of the county
